title: Black screen logging in league of legends
body:
When i try to log into the game it appear all the username password but the screen stays black ?? how to fix that and whn i get to log in the client looks like old and i cant see any friends or any request help me!![](http://imgur.com/a/sis2N)
[](http://imgur.com/a/VxlXJ)

replies.body: The black screen issue you're seeing is usually due to a network problem that's failing to establish a connection to the server and download assets.  You can get this fixed up by following the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  Feel free to reach out if you have any questions!
